        public ExecServerConfig(String className,
                        String objectKey,
                        InetAddress preferredHost,

        Create an exec-server configuration.
        Parameters:
        className - Name of the class to execute.
        objectKey - Object key under which class will register.
        properties - Properties for the server.

      • ExecServerConfig

        public ExecServerConfig(Node xml)
                 throws SAXException,
                        UnknownHostException
        Create an exec-server configuration.
        Parameters:
        xml - XML DOM description, must be an <execServer> element.
        Throws:
        SAXException - If xml is invalid.
        UnknownHostException - If the xml refers to an unknown host name.

      • ExecServerConfig

        public ExecServerConfig(String xml)
                 throws SAXException,
                        UnknownHostException
        Create an exec-server configuration.
        Parameters:
        xml - Serialized XML description.
        Throws:
        SAXException - If we can't parse xml.
        UnknownHostException - If the xml refers to an unknown host name.
